title: XGIMI Aura Smart Projector Review: Performance meets convenience
content:
If you told me you had a 100″ projector screen mounted up in your home bedroom, I’d probably think you were crazy. Most sane people would simply set up a smart TV for their comfort zone â€” but why not a smart projector? People tend to think of the theaters or full-fledged home cinema systems

The post XGIMI Aura Smart Projector Review: Performance meets convenience appeared first on XDA.
description: The Aura 4K laser short-throw is a high-performance smart projector that meets with style and simplicity. Read on in our in-depth review!
